message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product. I'm willing to pay $120 for it.
I appreciate your offer, Bob, but I was really hoping to get a bit more for it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $140.
I understand your position, Alice. I'm still interested in purchasing the product, but I can't go above $120. Could we meet somewhere in the middle?

I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, Bob. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $145. It's a fair price considering the product's value to me. Let me know if that works for you.
I see your point, Alice. How about $135? That's higher than my initial offer but still within my budget.
I'm glad we're getting closer, Bob! I can do $142, but that's as high as I'm willing to go. It's a good compromise, considering the product's value to me.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I think $138 would be a fair price for both of us. Let me know what you think.
I'm not sure we're getting any closer, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $138 and my last offer, so I'll do $140, but that's it.
Considering our previous discussions, I believe $137 would be a reasonable price for both parties involved. I hope you can accept this offer.
